title: ganarasamuDan
sahitya:
kaanarasamuDan nin tiruppugazhdanaiyE paDittiDa

karuNaipuri murugaiyanE manaNGkuLira maduramozhugu

(kaana)



anupallavi



deenaparaadeena sujana dainya haraNa nibuNa suguNa

taanava samhaara vElanE skandanE mukundan marumaganE

(kaana)



caraNam



aDiyiNaidanil iDaiyaRaada anbenum naRumaNam veesum

taDaiyaRa enRum vaaDaada muttamizh malar eDuttu

toDarezhuvagai swaramenum mruduvaana naaril toDuttu nidamum

paDipugazh pazhani mudaliya nin padigaLdORum paravi paNindu

(kaana)
